column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////My uncle loves this place! He comes all the time! Finally
column2: after seeing all of his pictures and posts of every time he comes here
column3: it's grown on me! Great ramen in downtown! Fast service! I recommend
column4: to sit at the bar or order to-go sometimes it can get cramped. I generally spend about $14 and leave at least a $5 tip.
